title: Server Dc/Ddoss
body: In a game, all 10 dc, we rejoin then another dc and cant rejoin.. help

replies.body:
There's no much the players can do in the case of spooky ghost games. If everyone disconnects, then what's meant to happen is that the game ends prematurely and doesn't appear in anyone's history, but in laggy situations that doesn't always happen.

Best thing to do is to just wait.
Sorry for the late response. We will look into this game and see if any funny business was happening at that time.
